name: Dice Show
description:
Unbalanced and rushed is all I have to say, I am planning on expanding this into a very short game.
Hope you enjoy it anyways!

Keep rolling to get higher Attack and block.

if you Roll 3 skulls you lose all the stats you gained.

Programming, Art, Design: Ilias L, ilPrinni
Sounds: Hoppo Chan
Music: Zomare

SOURCE CODE: https://github.com/iLays1/Die_Dice
